name: The Star Inari 100 Subscribers Game
description:
Oh yeah whoops forgot to put controls in game. I'll fix that eventually. Left/Right arrows to move, Space to jump. Pretty basic stuff.

This started as a joke. I was going to make a game in 2 hours for my friend Star Inari to play on his channel. Then I wound up adding more and more features.  6 hours later, I have a project that I might actually update in the future.

As I sit here alone at 2:25 in the morning, I question what my life has come to. Eh. I don't care anymore. Just subscribe to this fool (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKBbro4dFbrlJIEFNz8SZ5A) so I can make the next milestone project and suffer once again.
